scripts.dev-install: npm i nodemon -g && npm i && npm i --prefix client && npm i --prefix server
scripts.webpack-server-client-dev: concurrently "npm run server" "webpack --mode development && webpack-dev-server --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3000 --mode development --open --hot"
scripts.client-server-install: npm i --prefix client && npm i --prefix server
scripts.webpack-server-client: concurrently "npm run server" "webpack --mode production && webpack-dev-server --mode production --open --hot"
scripts.webpack-server-client-dev-2: concurrently "npm run server" "webpack --mode development && webpack-dev-server --mode development --open --hot"
scripts.audit-fix: npm audit fix && npm audit fix --prefix client && npm audit fix --prefix server
